properties.display_name: 1100 XE to SDWAN Upgrade Execute startup/DHCP 3.0

properties.script:
import requests

url = "https://$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HIVG3SZY9XW5n1U0KK00YWbxASmN5Spmo$:8443/j_security_check"
payload = 'j_username=$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HIXNAS4ZB2A3nfog7ClecDImdJypPMkJz$&j_password=$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HIXNHLMR0X105WF866b6HYEMZngjvTo5e$'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data = payload, verify=False)
cookie=response.cookies.get_dict()["JSESSIONID"]


url = "https://$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HIVG3SZY9XW5n1U0KK00YWbxASmN5Spmo$:8443/dataservice/system/device/smartaccount/sync"

payload = "{\"username\":\"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HDPEGZ21BU86A9QN3K64FEVvKvxP49L2R$\",\"password\":\"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDPDWDQRC4S1eUOi3O8oXfUhLB3GncXTF.input.variable_workflow_01HDPEMG9AANQ1m0yFkaCrXSdrIaBQfIqtK$\",\"validity_string\":\"valid\"}"
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Cookie': 'JSESSIONID=' + cookie
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data = payload, verify=False)

result=response

properties.description: Register a SN in Cisco Smart License Account and Virtual Account

properties.script:
import requests
import json

url = "https://cloudsso.cisco.com/as/token.oauth2"

payload = 'client_id=$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCM5KT93RQ6I7msqktHyFewweRaqCSzY$&client_secret=$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCM5KT9AOC7bQlhEp8xdkpyObP1ZmNac$&grant_type=client_credentials'
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
  'Cookie': 'PF=jKSXROyJtTcjeVR2CfDaju'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data = payload)
token=json.loads(response.text)["access_token"]


url = "https://swapi.cisco.com/services/api/software/dms/v2/smartaccounts/$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCM5KT9KUF7ZRsmH1ykeCwytLdNzEYlI$/virtualaccounts/$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCM5KT9HOJ1hJO5r6YRroCVTyHqK5Kdy$/devices"

payload = "{\n  \"overWrite\": false,\n  \"devices\": [\n    {\n      \"id\": \"1\",\n      \"device\": {\n        \"udi\": [\n          {\n            \"name\": \"udiProductId\",\n            \"value\": \"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCP29T211U7bZSJTjhTcU5tINhwrqqVL$\"\n          },\n          {\n            \"name\": \"udiSerialNumber\",\n            \"value\": \"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCOQYGNMNQ0x5B1GFVrFOjxlE3Ts9o0a$\"\n          }\n        ]\n       },\n      \"profileName\": \"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HBCPF0PCZT72S8tj1VticxZnmR7eo0mzP$\",\n      \"certificateSerialNumber\":\"$workflow.definition_workflow_01HBCM5L6Q7HF188NAJVwLmasdEG74gN3fj.input.variable_workflow_01HDNY82X2YF90coMuegqYZpG7YoBkagZtw$\",\n      \"profileUUID\": \"{{pnpprofileuuid}}\"\n    }\n  ]\n}"
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token,
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Cookie': 'b420f0102ef5de46bb444e8272d86ddc=7d78fbd8c155e92fa9bde3bce64ea945'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data = payload)

myoutput=json.loads(response.text)

template='''#cloud-boothook
  viptela-system:system
   system-ip             ***System-IP***
   site-id               ***Site-ID***
   sp-organization-name  ***Org-Name***
   organization-name     ***Org-Name***
   console-baud-rate     9600
   vbond ***vBond-IP*** port 12346

  aaa authorization exec default local
  username admin privilege 15 secret 5 $1$Ygw4$WZGpUN8yVtMovMRmuvcfM0
  interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
   no shutdown
   ip dhcp client default-router distance 1
   ip address dhcp client-id GigabitEthernet0/0/0
   ip mtu    1500
   mtu 1500
   negotiation auto
  exit
  interface Tunnel0
   no shutdown
   ip unnumbered GigabitEthernet0/0/0
   no ip redirects
   tunnel source GigabitEthernet0/0/0
   tunnel mode sdwan
  exit
!
  sdwan
   interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
    tunnel-interface
     encapsulation ipsec weight 1
     no border
     color private1
     no last-resort-circuit
     no low-bandwidth-link
     control-connections
     no vbond-as-stun-server
     vmanage-connection-preference 5
     port-hop
     carrier                       default
     nat-refresh-interval          5
     hello-interval                1000
     hello-tolerance               12
     allow-service all
     no allow-service bgp
     allow-service dhcp
     allow-service dns
     allow-service icmp
     allow-service sshd
     no allow-service netconf
     no allow-service ntp
     no allow-service ospf
     no allow-service stun
     no allow-service snmp
    exit
  exit
  omp
   no shutdown
   send-path-limit  4
   ecmp-limit       4
   graceful-restart
   no as-dot-notation
   timers
    holdtime               60
    advertisement-interval 1
    graceful-restart-timer 43200
    eor-timer              300
   exit
'''
new_ciscosdwancfg=""
new_ciscosdwancfg = template.replace("***System-IP***","$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDSV1V4DUSR7MH1m3MUx4gxmjkqYU0k01.input.variable_workflow_01HDSVOFXX4Q32RL1ub52fU3yiWU9WoV5N7$").replace("***Site-ID***","$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDSV1V4DUSR7MH1m3MUx4gxmjkqYU0k01.input.variable_workflow_01HDSVTPLT47K4K9Cx3poE12tQ4BdPDVVDu$").replace("***Org-Name***","$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDSV1V4DUSR7MH1m3MUx4gxmjkqYU0k01.input.variable_workflow_01HDSW4UP9XLG4IpxNe2nGgiWNdGmZdpu67$").replace("***vBond-IP***","$workflow.definition_workflow_01HDSV1V4DUSR7MH1m3MUx4gxmjkqYU0k01.input.variable_workflow_01HDSW9SWVI4G7Uf1OISFrSsgvWn1SGlo65$")

aaa="""$activity.definition_activity_01HCW1UEQN2AN1qq7tQqY0iPoBvUmcdBJnh.output.variable_workflow_01H8L2YJB446Z41uRHNQ3Sp8XY3ocMyFlYj$"""

flashtotal=aaa.split(" bytes total (")[0][1:]
flashfree=aaa.split(" bytes total (")[1].split(" ")[0]
